title: Why are they closing Mt. Misery Road near the railroad tracks?
text:
Sorry for the slow response.



A story at StarNewsOnline.com (http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20151130/NEWS/151139982) answers this question:



A pipeline under Mt. Misery Road needs to be completed as part of the construction of I-140 between U.S. 74/76 and Cedar Hill Road
